MapxusMap.description: MapxusMap provides control and listening to indoor maps.

methods.name: setMapxusStyle
methods.docblock:
Setting the general map appearance.
@param {MapxusMapStyle} style style enum value.

params.name: style
params.description: style enum value.

methods.description: Setting the general map appearance.

methods.name: setMapxusStyleWithString
methods.docblock:
Set up custom map appearance, you can contact us for map appearance customization.
@param {String} name the style name we provide.

params.name: name
params.description: the style name we provide.

methods.description: Set up custom map appearance, you can contact us for map appearance customization.

methods.name: setMapLanguage
methods.docblock:
Setting the map language.
@param {String} name map language with options for en, zh-Hant, zh-Hans, ja, ko, default.

params.name: name
params.description: map language with options for en, zh-Hant, zh-Hans, ja, ko, default.

methods.description: Setting the map language.

methods.name: selectIndoorScene

params.name: zoomMode
params.description: Zoom method

params.name: insets
params.description: zoom to fit the margins, if zoomMode is MXMZoomDisable, the value passed in is invalid

params.name: buildingId
params.description: id of the building to be selected

params.name: floor
params.description: name of the floor to be selected

methods.description: Select the building and the floor of that building by code.

props.name: mapOption
props.description: Initialization parameters, setting them before rendering the map.

props.name: selectFontColor
props.description: Colour of selected font for floor selector bar.

props.name: selectBoxColor
props.description: Colour of selected box for floor selector bar.

props.name: fontColor
props.description: Colour of unselected font for floor selector bar.

props.name: indoorControllerAlwaysHidden
props.description: Set floor selector bar always hidden.

props.name: selectorPosition
props.description: Set the position of the indoor map control, it is a enum MapxusSelectorPosition, the default is CENTER_LEFT.

props.name: selectorPositionCustom
props.description:
Control the margin between the floor selector bar and the mapview, which is related to the setting of `selectorPosition`,
such as selectorPosition is CENTER_LEFT, x represents the distance of left, y represents the distance of top.

props.name: logoBottomMargin
props.description:
Set the margin of the 'Mapxus logo' from the bottom of the mapView, you can only pass 0 or a positive number, passing 
a negative number will reset it to 0

props.name: openStreetSourceBottomMargin
props.description:
Set the margin of the 'Open Street Source' from the bottom of the mapView, you can only pass in 0 or a positive number, 
passing in a negative number will reset it to 0.

props.name: outdoorHidden
props.description: Set whether to display outdoor map.

props.name: gestureSwitchingBuilding
props.description: Click on the map to switch the building, the default status is YES.

props.name: autoChangeBuilding
props.description:
The default state is YES. when auto switch mode is on and the building is moved to the centre of the view,
the building could be automatically selected to show its internal structure.

props.name: onTappedOnPoi
props.description: This event is triggered when poi is clicked.

props.name: onTappedOnBlank
props.description: This event is triggered when blank of the map is clicked.

props.name: onLongPressed
props.description: Map long press listener, gets called when a user long presses the map.

props.name: onIndoorSceneChange
props.description: This event is triggered when indoor scene is change.

props.name: onIndoorStatusChange
props.description: This event is triggered when indoor status is change.

MapxusMap.name: MapxusMap

MapxusMapLocation.android.description: MapxusMapLocation backed by Mapxus Map SDK

props.name: onLocationStarted
props.description: This event is triggered when location started.

props.name: onLocationStopped
props.description: This event is triggered when location Stopped.

props.name: onLocationError
props.description: This event is triggered when location Error.

props.name: onLocationChange
props.description: This event is triggered when location change.

props.name: onCompassChange
props.description: This event is triggered when compass change.

props.name: followUserMode
props.description: The mode used to track the user location on the map. One of; "None", "Follow", "FollowWithHeading". Or just pass a number , "None" to 0,"Follow" to 1,"FollowWithHeading" to 3

MapxusMapLocation.android.name: MapxusMapLocation.android

MapxusPointAnnotationView.description:
PointAnnotation represents a one-dimensional shape located at a single geographical coordinate.

Consider using ShapeSource and SymbolLayer instead, if you have many points and you have static images,
they'll offer much better performance

.
If you need interctive views please use MarkerView,
as with PointAnnotation on Android child views are rendered onto a bitmap for better performance.

methods.name: refresh
methods.docblock:
On android point annotation is rendered offscreen with a canvas into an image.
To rerender the image from the current state of the view call refresh.
Call this for example from Image#onLoad.
methods.description:
On android point annotation is rendered offscreen with a canvas into an image.
To rerender the image from the current state of the view call refresh.
Call this for example from Image#onLoad.

props.name: buildingId
props.description: Mark annotaion which building it is located.

props.name: floor
props.description: Mark annotaion which floor it is located.

props.name: id
props.description: A string that uniquely identifies the annotation

props.name: title
props.description: The string containing the annotation’s title. Note this is required to be set if you want to see a callout appear on iOS.

props.name: snippet
props.description: The string containing the annotation’s snippet(subtitle). Not displayed in the default callout.

props.name: selected
props.description:
Manually selects/deselects annotation
@type {[type]}

props.name: draggable
props.description: Enable or disable dragging. Defaults to false.

props.name: coordinate
props.description: The center point (specified as a map coordinate) of the annotation.

props.name: anchor
props.description:
Specifies the anchor being set on a particular point of the annotation.
The anchor point is specified in the continuous space [0.0, 1.0] x [0.0, 1.0],
where (0, 0) is the top-left corner of the image, and (1, 1) is the bottom-right corner.
Note this is only for custom annotations not the default pin view.
Defaults to the center of the view.

props.name: onSelected
props.description: This callback is fired once this annotation is selected. Returns a Feature as the first param.

props.name: onDeselected
props.description: This callback is fired once this annotation is deselected.

props.name: onDragStart
props.description: This callback is fired once this annotation has started being dragged.

props.name: onDragEnd
props.description: This callback is fired once this annotation has stopped being dragged.

props.name: onDrag
props.description: This callback is fired while this annotation is being dragged.

MapxusPointAnnotationView.name: MapxusPointAnnotationView

NavigationView.description: This component makes it easy to draw and control routes.

buildingSearchManager.name: buildingSearchManager
buildingSearchManager.description: Use buildingSearchManager to search the indoor buildings we offer and get the building details.

methods.name: buildingSearchGlobal
methods.description: Search for buildings worldwide.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters of the global search: keywords (optional), offset, page.

methods.name: buildingSearchOnBbox
methods.description: Search within a rectangular area.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters for searching within a rectangular area: keywords (optional), bbox, offset, page.

methods.name: buildingSearchNearbyCenter
methods.description: Search within a circular area.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters for searching within a circular area: keywords (optional), center, distance, offset, page.

methods.name: buildingSearchByIds
methods.description: Search building by buildingId.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters for searching with buildingId: buildingIds.

methods.name: reverseGeoCode
methods.description:
Convert the positioning coordinates to the specific building and floor, providing users with more 
detailed and more user-friendly positioning information.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters of reverse geocode: location, ordinalFloor.

methods.name: poiCategorySearch
methods.description: POI category search, which allows you to know what type of POI is in a building floor.

params.name: params
params.description: The POI category search request parameters is as follows: buildingId, floor.

poiSearchManager.name: poiSearchManager
poiSearchManager.description: Use poiSearchManager to search the indoor POI we offer and get the POI details.

methods.name: poiSearchInIndoorScene
methods.description: Search by Building Information

params.name: params
params.description:
parameters for POIs searching in the specified building: keywords (optional), 
buildingId, floor (optional), offset, page, category(optional).

methods.name: poiSearchOnBbox
methods.description: Search within a rectangular area.

params.name: params
params.description:
parameters for searching within a rectangular area: keywords (optional), bbox, 
offset, page, category(optional).

methods.name: poiSearchNearbyCenter
methods.description: Search within a circular area.

params.name: params
params.description:
parameters for searching within a circular area: keywords (optional), center, 
meterDistance, offset, page, category (optional).

methods.name: poiSearchByIds
methods.description: Search POI by POIId.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters for searching with POIId: POIIds.

methods.name: orientationPoiSearch
methods.description:
Query the angle of the nearby POI relative to the center point. Through this function, you can 
view the nearby POI in relative orientation and provide the user with a positioning reference.

params.name: params
params.description: parameters for searching: angle, distanceSearchType, buildingId, floor, center, distance.

routeSearchManager.name: routeSearchManager
routeSearchManager.description: Use RouteSearchManager to planning the route.

methods.name: routeSearch
methods.description: Searh for the route planning

params.name: params
params.description:
parameters for route planning: fromBuilding (optional), fromFloor (optional), fromLon, 
fromLat, toBuilding (optional), toFloor (optional), toLon, toLat, vehicle (optional), locale, toDoor (optional).
